header.title: Matching Marketplace
header.subtext: Search, connect and build partnerships at speeds never seen before

database.title: Database
database.subtext:
No matter your size and activity, set up your tailor-made company profile to find your best match! 


We believe for fashion to grow in transparency and fair partnerships. Digitalising supply chains with our detailed industry-related profile templates transforms networking.


 Suppliers and makers can provide instant information about MOQs, lead time, product range and sustainability standards to facilitate a filtered search for buyers to find their match.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.subtext: Optimize on the speed, accessibility and efficiency of our digital platform to connect with worldwide partners and grow your business.

marketsuppliers.title: For Suppliers
marketsuppliers.subtext:
* Post listings and virtual catalogues to promote production capabilities
* Showcase expertise by highlighting sustainability standards and quality credentials

marketbuyers.title: For Buyers
marketbuyers.subtext:
* Browse through a range of garments, fabrics, yarns and services proposed by our list of trusted suppliers
* Send RFQs and RFIs to compare and identify the right partner to meet your company needs
